---

## Community Guidelines

- Check existing issues and documentation first
- Provide minimal reproducible examples
- Be respectful of volunteers' time
- Consider posting to [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/diogoribeiro7/heavytails/discussions) for general questions
- Use Issues for specific bugs or feature requests

## For Complex Questions

If your question involves:
- Custom distributions or complex mathematical models
- Large-scale data analysis
- Integration with proprietary systems
- Consulting-level guidance

Consider reaching out directly to the maintainer at dfr@esmad.ipp.pt for potential collaboration or consulting arrangements.
